extracted_playbook.title: Read Microsoft January 2020 Release Notes
extracted_playbook.description: Access and read the Microsoft January 2020 Release Notes page for detailed information on critical patches.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Critical Patches to Mission Critical Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Prioritize and apply critical patches to mission critical systems, internet-facing systems, and networked servers.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Patches to Other Affected IT/OT Assets
extracted_playbook.description: After patching mission critical systems, prioritize and apply patches to other affected IT/OT assets.

extracted_playbook.title: Review Guide to Enterprise Patch Management Technologies
extracted_playbook.description: Review NIST Special Publication 800-40 Revision 3 to understand the basics of enterprise patch management technologies.

extracted_playbook.title: Review CISA Insights Publications
extracted_playbook.description: Access and review CISA Insights publications for background information on cyber threats and ready-made mitigation activities.

extracted_playbook.title: Review CISA’s Cyber Essentials
extracted_playbook.description: Download and review CISA’s Cyber Essentials guide for small businesses and local government agencies to develop cybersecurity practices.
